item.description:
Since Liv and David are mixing things up this month, I figure I would help get some board game action happening on a Saturday night.  But this event has a theme: obscure board games published before 1990 that are collecting dust in your closet. :-)

Bring along a game that probably isn't well known but that you still have (and is maybe falling apart) and was dear to you growing up and let's see if we can't recapture some of the excitement of the past.  And bring something to eat that you enjoyed long ago as well.

 

----------------------------

This is a Mini-Meetup. Anyone can sign up, but I would please ask that you allow new or previously inactive members get a slot if they are on the waiting list since there is limited seating.  Thanks. See this discussion for more details.

----------------------------

 

 

Food theme: 

The theme for this event will be "vintage". Please bring a food item to share with the group that is "vintage".  Interpret that however you want, whether that is a bottle of fine wine, some aged cheese, or a blast from your past. I will try to have also generic, healthy snacks on hand for all diets.

 

About the location: 
This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Vintage Board Game Roadshow
